ygData.subject: Hi all!! Couple Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I am new to being a bard(and using one) so I have a couple of questions. Frist how do I start a chain? Also I am a lvl 5 bard In Kithnen, Where should I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi I am new to being a bard(and using one) so I have a couple of
questions. Frist how do I start a chain? Also I am a lvl 5 bard In
Kithnen, Where should I hunt and what should I buy(have tarnished
battle axe,and all the patchwork that can be tailored and a drum). ANy
advice?

--- eqbards-owner@onelist.com wrote:
> Ho and well met fellow travellers and bards alike.
> I hope we can make this a
> meaningful moderation. feel free to announce your
> comments for the good of all.
>
>
>
> Thank you,
> Torenithus Legendmaker
> Bard of Qeynos
